name: TheAtlantic
text: RT @danteramos: “And there we have it: Mythical looters and mythical anarchists are now more frightening to some people than an actual forest fire.” Here’s @anneapplebaum on the chilling lessons from Oregon: https://t.co/Zlnuz46dfi

name: TheAtlantic
text:
RT @JeffreyGoldberg: This is an amazing story:

name: TheAtlantic
text: "[E]ven though the forest fires have already harmed more people and caused more physical damage," @anneapplebaum argues, "the images of the Portland riots are far more likely to dominate the public debate in Oregon and beyond." https://t.co/JIZUlgj2bb
